attributes.action: Allocate funds to explore exactly why The Furious Sleep are quite so terribly, terribly bad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, wish to petition the government to explore the sheer inexplicable awfulness of Cambridge based "pop" group The Furious Sleep. We feel that this is a valid scientific dilemma and is worthy of further investigation. Should this problem be solved it will benefit the population of the UK, and eventually, solve the problem of awful bands on a global scale. There may even be the possibility of considerable medical and social benefits. All scientists involved may need to wear sunglasses and ear protectors.

Peter O'Neasden
Rupert Bear
Micky Rouke
The Ghost of Christmas Past

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
